information: We can offer high quality inspection and control services, with a high level of trust, at any destination worldwide. We know the needs of the tuna industry and its productive processes, so we can offer a high quality external production control service for your precooked loins, so they meet the requested specifications. Additionally, we have incorporated the inspection of new products as mackerel, horse mackerel or squid.
keywords: Marine surveyors, fish inspectors, production control, quality control, International inspectors
